articles.title: Nasdaq leads Wall Street gains as Microsoft hits record - Reuters
articles.description: Wall Street's three major stock averages closed higher on Monday with Nasdaq's 1% rally leading the charge as heavyweight Microsoft hit a record high after it hired prominent artificial intelligence executives.
